results.title: Aggressive and fatal statin-induced dermatomyositis: a case report
results.text_hl: We present the case of a 69-year-old man with early onset @<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@DM@@@) precipitated by a small dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Dermatomyositis-like syndrome and HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor (statin) intake.
results.text_hl: A @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ developed an adult-onset @<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis-like syndrome@@@ characterized by @DISEASE_Exanthema @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@skin rash@@@ and progressive @DISEASE_Spinal_Muscular_Atrophies_of_Childhood @DISEASE_MESH:D014897 @@@proximal@@@ @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ concurrent with the intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: [Fluvastatin-induced dermatomyositis].
results.text_hl: Six cases of drug-induced @<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis@@@ have been described with statins: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@.

results.title: Lipid-lowering agent-triggered dermatomyositis and polymyositis: a case series and literature review.
results.text_hl: Lipid-lowering agent-triggered @<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Dermatomyositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@DM@@@) or @DISEASE_Polymyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D017285 @@@polymyositis@@@ (@DISEASE_Polymyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D017285 @@@PM@@@) is a rare event.
